column1: But how? I mean, with this over here...

Futaba's really gotten
into analyzing Sophia...

So, what do you think, Futaba? How's
Sophia's code look?

Well, her programmer is a genius. No doubt
about that.

You can figure a person out by their code, and
not just their skill level. Their habits, thought
processes, even their personalities are there.

This code is so advanced that even I can't read
it and comprehend it right away.

It'll take me weeks—even months to actually
grasp how Sophia works.
Take you months? That's a serious program...

I don't understand. Do you mean I'm
impressive?

Yeah, you're impressive! You're some kinda
Super-AI!

If you ever went public, everyone would
call EMMA old hat!

When something was popular at one point but
stops being popular, it becomes old hat. It's
a saying people don't really use anymore.

Okay, I got it. You are very knowledgeable,
Futaba.

Don't go teaching her too much weird stuff,
okay?

While we're at it, did you see anything about
Sophia's past?

Her programmer's name, or a company's,
maybe?

Nothing yet—and most of those leave a
signature of some sort in their work, too...

Anywaaay, I'm gonna keep crackin' at it from
home. I'll let you know once I find anything
new.
Don't stay up too late, okay?
Aw, cut me some slack! I'm in vaycay mode!
I'm good! It's just around the block.
Well, folks: time for me to make like a tree!
Boy was that a helluva day.

I never would've imagined something like
this would happen.
All we can do is get ready.
I just wanted to have fun...

You're a real standout, but that just might mean
you're going to see some trouble again soon.

Alice, EMMA, this new Metaverse... A mountain
of mysteries sure is piling up fast.

Yep, that's right. If we went into this half-cocked,
we'd be disgraces of phantom thieves.

I know, but we don't have a choice. We'll cut
loose once things are settled.

Well, the Metaverse reappearing may have
been a surprise, but even that doesn't compare
with Sophia.

We were just talking about how you're a
huge mystery.

Wait, I don't have to take that from some
mystery app!

By the way, how does some top of the line
program lose all its memory, huh?

I mean, AI are supposed to be super-smart,
right?
Aw, don't get TOO down over it...

I am humanity's companion. If I'm not helpful,
then I am useless.
Don't be so hard on yourself... At least you remember that much, right?
Right. I think that means it's important.

But is being helpful all you'll do to become
a good companion?
Is that not how it works?

Please explain. How else can one be
a companion?

I guess you just have to find a way to
understand the human heart?

R-Right! Then, you'll be able to empathize
with other people, and be a good companion
to them... I guess.
Look, just— just don't worry about it!

All you need to do is join us and learn from
all the kinds of people we meet!

In exchange, you lend a hand to the Phantom
Thieves. So I guess you could call this a deal.

Okay... That is a decent deal. Especially since
it should help me become a good companion
for humanity.
Yep—so long as it's good with our leader.

Then it's a deal. Glad to have you on board,
Sophia!

We've got plenty of scouting to do tomorrow.
We should get some rest.

We said goodnight to Futaba,
then headed to bed ourselves...
